column6: FEAR ITSELF tie-in! Fear has spread across the land and has made its way to Broxton, Oklahoma. As the Broxton residents prepare for a major disaster, Iron Man and Stark Resilient head into action.
column8: | editor:Alejandro Arbona | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Frank D'Armata | writer:Matt Fraction | penciller:Salvador Larroca
